name: Fibromyalgia Simulator
description:
I made a game about my experience living with fibromyalgia

It's really personal, and kinda sad.

Being chronically ill is really expensive. By donating to my Patreon you support me in making more art and games like this one, as well as help me survive on a day to day basis. Patreon money goes toward paying my food, rent, and heaps of medical expenses. Become a Patron here.

<3
